name: AD-LIB: the Glitch Society
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 40 - 'The more you have, the worse it is'

A dystopian sim-runner of an advertising agency Creative wearing on the experimental AR cyber-tech-device that makes him have more intel on which ads people prefer now, however the device is a black market prototype and may get disastrously glitchy.

Controls: A+D (move/avoid) + L.Mouse (click/install)
